actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to establish an educational assistance program to encourage the enlistment of persons in, and retention of members of, the District of Columbia National Guard by providing to certain such members financial assistance to attend undergraduate, vocational, or technical courses.
short_title: Major General David F. Wherley, Jr., District of Columbia National Guard Retention and College Access Program Act

summary.text:
Major General David F. Wherley, Jr., District of Columbia National Guard Retention and College Access Program Act

This bill establishes a program to provide financial assistance to members of the District of Columbia National Guard who are pursuing their first undergraduate, masters, doctoral, vocational, or technical degrees.

titles.title: Major General David F. Wherley, Jr., District of Columbia National Guard Retention and College Access Program Act
Major General David F. Wherley, Jr., District of Columbia National Guard Retention and College Access Program Act

To amend title 10, United States Code, to establish an educational assistance program to encourage the enlistment of persons in, and retention of members of, the District of Columbia National Guard by providing to certain such members financial assistance to attend undergraduate, vocational, or technical courses.
